infoHouse: Hufflepuff was founded by Helga Hufflepuff, who prized dedication, patience, loyalty, and fair play.
infoHouseBottom: Hufflepuff is known for producing trustworthy and hardworking witches and wizards, including Cedric Diggory and Nymphadora Tonks.

characterOne.name: Cedric Diggory
characterOne.info: A fair and honorable student, known for his bravery, loyalty, and sportsmanship.

characterTwo.name: Nymphadora Tonks
characterTwo.info: A loyal and cheerful witch, gifted in metamorphmagus abilities and known for her dedication to the Order of the Phoenix.

characterThree.name: Professor Pomona Sprout
characterThree.info: The Head of Hufflepuff House and Herbology professor, she exemplifies patience, care, and guidance for her students.
